name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in API Development and Data Engineering, utilizing a tech stack that includes **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **Fastify**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, **Docker**, and **Terraform**. I possess a strong foundation in CI/CD automation and Performance Optimization, ensuring that applications are developed efficiently and are scalable. My deep understanding of Clean Architecture and Modular Design allows me to deliver solutions that are maintainable and aligned with industry standards.
In addition to my backend expertise, I have a proven track record in integrating machine learning capabilities within applications, having developed comprehensive machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows. My background spans healthcare and financial sectors, where I have implemented robust and secure applications in compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am dedicated to leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create high-performance solutions.
